Description:
We are currently seeking dynamic and experienced Tele Sales Executives to join our esteemed nursery in Abu Dhabi. As a Tele Sales Executive, you will play a pivotal role in promoting our nursery's offerings and facilitating the enrollment of children. This is an exceptional opportunity to utilize your sales acumen and contribute to the advancement of our nursery's outreach. Key Responsibilities: Engage prospective parents via telephone and various communication channels to introduce our nursery's comprehensive services.
Offer detailed insights into our programs, facilities, and advantages to potential clients.
Skillfully persuade and guide parents towards enrolling their children in our nursery.
Maintain meticulous records of all interactions, ensuring the customer database is current.
Surpass defined sales targets and objectives while collaborating with the sales team to refine strategies.  Skills
Skills:
A minimum of 3 years' proven track record in tele sales.
Proficiency in spoken and written English and Arabic (not mandatory).
Possession of a valid UAE driving license (DL) is preferred.
Exceptional communication and interpersonal proficiencies.
Strong negotiation skills coupled with persuasive abilities.
Results-driven mindset with a commitment to achieving and exceeding targets.
Demonstrated aptitude for both independent and collaborative work.
Genuine passion for early childhood education and childcare.

Competitive salary, with remuneration reaching up to AED 4000, commensurate with experience and qualifications.
Performance-driven Special incentives and bonuses.
Opportunities for professional advancement within a nurturing work environment.
Comprehensive training and resources to further enhance sales expertise.
